keyword: how many calories in a sausage patty
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage Patty?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sausage patty, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, and quick variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage Patty?
assumptions: Standard pork breakfast sausage patty, cooked (pan-fried), approximately 57 g, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type (pork, turkey, etc.), size, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked pork sausage patty provides about 180 kcal and 8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage patty?
faqs.a: About 180 kcal for one standard cooked pork sausage patty.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage patty?
Are sausage patties high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 16 g total fat, including 6 g saturated fat per patty.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a sausage patty?
faqs.a: Pan-frying adds minimal calories if no extra oil; baking or air-frying keeps it similar to the basis.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in a sausage patty?
faqs.a: Approximately 400 mg sodium per patty, varying by brand and seasoning.
